welcome_message_body: Welcome to Khimki, Russia! This charming city, known for its rich history and beautiful parks, invites you to explore and enjoy all it has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful stay!

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Sheremetyevo International Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Sheremetyevo International Airport, serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sheremetyevo International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Vnukovo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Vnukovo Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ostafyevo International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Ostafyevo International Airport, serving mostly domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
